column6: this is my work and my gloryâ€”to bring to pass the immortality and eternal life of man.

verse: And if it seem evil unto you to serve the Lord
column6: choose you this day whom ye will serve; whether the gods which your fathers served that were on the other side of the flood
column7: or the gods of the Amorites
column8: in whose land ye dwell: but as for me and my house

verse: For I know that my redeemer liveth
column6: and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth: And though after my skin worms destroy this body
column7: yet in my flesh shall I see God:

verse: Neither do men light a candle
column6: and put it under a bushel
column7: but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house. Let your light so shine before men
column8: that they may see your good works
column9: and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

verse: And it came to pass that I
column7: said unto my father: I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded
column8: for I know that the Lord giveth no commandments unto the children of men
column9: save he shall prepare a way for them that they may accomplish the thing which he commandeth them.

verse: Now ye may suppose that this is foolishness in me; but behold I say unto you
column6: that by small and simple things are great things brought to pass; and small means in many instances doth confound the wise. And the Lord God doth work by means to bring about his great and eternal purposes; and by very small means the Lord doth confound the wise and bringeth about the salvation of many souls.
